entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
